nodes.name: Iai Thunder Dance
nodes.desc: When you gain 3 or more Thunder Sigils, a Special Attack is cast, attacking 2 times consecutively.

nodes.name: Blade Intent
nodes.desc: 3 points of Blade Intent are gained when an Expertise Skill is cast.

nodes.name: Keen Strike
nodes.desc: When Basic Attacks deal DMG, 10% chance to trigger Piercing Slash, once per second.

nodes.name: Swift Blade
nodes.desc: When Agility reaches 500 points, Crit DMG and Lucky Damage +5%.

nodes.name: Overdrive Refinement
nodes.desc: Reduces the CD of Overdrive by 30%.

nodes.name: Thunder Charm Blade
nodes.desc: For each 1 Thunder Sigil consumed by Expertise Skill, gain an additional 3 points of Blade Intent.

nodes.name: Thunder Whirl
nodes.desc: Piercing Slash grants 1 layer of Overdrive.

nodes.name: Keen Enhancement
nodes.desc: Increases the fixed chance to trigger Piercing Slash by 10%.

nodes.name: Iaido Slash Spec
nodes.desc:
Further enhances the ability to use Iaido Slash.
When the number of Thunder Sigils consumed by Iaido Slash and its enhanced skill (Thunder Cut) equals the current maximum Thunder Sigil count, increases the DMG of Iaido Slash and its enhanced skill (Thunder Cut) by 12% and grants Super Armor during the cast.

nodes.name: Iaido Mastery
nodes.desc:
Iaido Slash's Crit +10%.
When Iaido Slash's critical rate exceeds 60%, each additional 1% grants 1% bonus Crit DMG.

nodes.name: Thunder Sigil Affinity
nodes.desc: Each additional Thunder Sigil consumed by Expertise or Special Attacks increases your Lightning DMG dealt by 1.5% when they deal DMG.

nodes.name: Flash Frenzy Blade
nodes.desc: Crit hit of Iaido Slash grants a fixed 10% chance to clear the CD of Flash Strike and Raijin Dash. Chance +10% for each Thunder Sigil consumed.

nodes.name: Zen Moment
nodes.desc: Crit Hits of Special Attacks grant 100 Blade Intent.

nodes.name: Thunder God's Might
nodes.desc: Activate Volt Surge. Flash Strike and Raijin Dash evolve into Dracoflash and Phantom Slash.

nodes.name: Thunder Curse
nodes.desc:
Special Attacks inflict Thunder Curse on the target upon dealing DMG.
Thunder Curse: Each stack of Thunder Curse increases the target's DMG taken from you by 2% for 10s, stacking up to 4 times.

nodes.name: Instant Slash
nodes.desc: Iaido Slash reduces the Armor of the target hit by 6%. The effect lasts 5s and stacks up to 5 times.

nodes.name: Rapid Thunder Assault
nodes.desc: Each additional Thunder Sigil consumed by a skill increases its DMG by 3%.

nodes.name: Frenzied Thunder Roar
nodes.desc: Defeating an enemy triggers Thunderburst, once every 3s.

nodes.name: Wind Assault II
nodes.desc: Unleashes formidable energy to weaken nearby enemies, reducing their movement speed. Common monsters below 15% HP will instantly disperse.

nodes.name: Violent Slash
nodes.desc: Increases the critical rate of Iaido Slash and Thunder Cut by 12%.

nodes.name: End of Annihilation
nodes.desc: The final strike of Oblivion Combo is empowered into Ultimate Slash.

nodes.name: Blade Intent Thunder Strike
nodes.desc: When Iaido Slash deals Crit DMG, if the Blade Intent exceeds 20, launches Thunderstrike (which can only be triggered once per use of Iaido Slash).

nodes.name: Wind Assault I
nodes.desc: Crit Rate obtained in any way is increased by 12%, but Luck chance obtained in any way are reduced by 10%.

nodes.name: Flash Sharp Strike
nodes.desc:
Triggers Sharp Strike when casting Iaido Slash.
Sharp Strike: Increases Crit Rate of Flash Strike and its enhanced skill (Dracoflash) by 10%. If Flash Strike and its enhanced skill (Dracoflash) deals Crit DMG 1 time, gains 1 Thunder Sigil. This effect is removed after the use of Flash Strike and its enhanced skill (Dracoflash) or after 10s.

nodes.name: Thunder Sigil Rewind
nodes.desc: When consuming Thunder Sigils, there is a chance to return 1 Thunder Sigil, and for each additional 1 Thunder Sigil consumed, the return chance +8%.

nodes.name: Unmatched Raijin Dash
nodes.desc:
Raijin Dash and its enhanced skill (Phantom Slash) ignore the target's Armor.
Raijin Dash and its enhanced skill (Phantom Slash) deal 10% more damage per additional 1 enemy hit.

nodes.name: Infinite Thunder
nodes.desc: For every 5 Thunder Sigils consumed, the remaining CD time of Volt Surge -0.5s.

nodes.name: Vacuum Slash
nodes.desc: Each cast of Flash Strike, Raijin Dash, or its evolved skills grants 1 layer of Thundrage. When Thundrage reaches 5 stacks, Iaido Slash evolves into Thunder Cut. After casting Thunder Cut, 5 stacks of Thundrage are consumed. Thundrage stacks up to 8 times.

nodes.name: Thunder Reversal
nodes.desc:
Consumes 100 Blade Intent to gain stacks of Thunder Reversal Mark. When Thunder Reversal Mark reaches 5 stacks, casting Iaido Slash grants the Thunder Reversal effect and removes all Thunder Reversal Mark stacks.
Thunder Reversal: Gain a 10% Lightning DMG bonus for 15s. During Thunder Reversal, Thunder Reversal Mark cannot be gained.

nodes.name: Duel Awareness
nodes.desc: Deals 20% more DMG to enemies with 80% HP or above.

nodes.name: Break Slash
nodes.desc: When dealing Crit DMG, Iaido Slash and its enhanced skill (Thunder Cut) nullifies 30% of the targets' Armor.

nodes.name: Shadow Despise
nodes.desc: For each enemy within 3m, you gain 3% Armor Penetration, up to 15%. This effect is doubled against Elite or stronger enemies.

nodes.name: Dual Blade Intent
nodes.desc:
When Blade Intent is at least 100, Flash Strike, Raijin Dash, and their enhanced skills (Dracoflash, Phantom Slash) gain Crit Rate by 10%.
When Blade Intent is at least 100, greatly increases Flash Strike's casting speed.

nodes.name: Bladewind Domain
nodes.desc: Every 3 casts of Overdrive allows the next Iaido Slash to generate a Bladewind Domain in front. Each time Bladewind Domain deals DMG, reduces the CD of Oblivion Combo by 1.5s.

nodes.name: Thundrage
nodes.desc: Each use of Dracoflash or Phantom Slash grants 4 stacks of Thundrage, up to 8 stacks.

nodes.name: Thunder Seed
nodes.desc: Dealing DMG with Thundercut guarantees 1 Charge Seed.

nodes.name: Moonstrike Delay
nodes.desc:
Blade Intent cap +25.
After 5 consecutive Thundercuts in one go, it evolves into the more powerful Thundercleave, which deals higher DMG.

nodes.name: Touch of Thunder Soul
nodes.desc: Moonstrike has a fixed 30% chance to cast Thunderstrike on a Lucky Hit.

nodes.name: Chaos Breaker
nodes.desc: When Stormflash is activated, Moonstrike evolves into Chaos Breaker.

nodes.name: Thunder Curse
nodes.desc:
Special Attacks inflict Thunder Curse on the target upon dealing DMG.
Thunder Curse: Each stack of Thunder Curse increases the target's DMG taken from you by 2% for 10s, stacking up to 4 times.

nodes.name: Thunder Scythe
nodes.desc: Reduces the Charge Seeds that Storm Scythe consumes by 3.

nodes.name: Moonlight Charge
nodes.desc: When Moonstrike triggers a Lucky Hit, it has a fixed 30% chance to restore 1 Charge Seed.

nodes.name: Frenzied Thunder Roar
nodes.desc: Defeating an enemy triggers Thunderburst, once every 3s.

nodes.name: Thunder Strike Whisper
nodes.desc: Increases the Lightning DMG Thunderstrike deals by 50%, yet Thunderstrike never deals Crit DMG.

nodes.name: Thousand Thunder Flashes
nodes.desc: Each 2 Thunderstrike triggered reduces the CD of Stormflash by 0.5s.

nodes.name: End of Annihilation
nodes.desc: The final strike of Oblivion Combo is empowered into Ultimate Slash.

nodes.name: Phantom Delay
nodes.desc: Casting Chaos Breaker immediately grants 30 Charge Seeds.

nodes.name: Moon Blade Swift
nodes.desc: Moonstrike additionally deals 1 instance of Whirling DMG every 6s. Each 2% Haste reduces its CD by 1%.

nodes.name: Phantom Scythe Realm I
nodes.desc: Increases Max Moonstrike by 1. Reduces the DMG dealt by Moonstrike by 35%.

nodes.name: Moonstrike Sharp Strike
nodes.desc: When Blade Intent is at least 50, Moonstrike and its enhanced skill (Chaos Breaker) are guaranteed to lands a Crit.

nodes.name: Raijin Dash Charge
nodes.desc: When Thundercut triggers a Lucky Hit, grants 1 Charge Seed.

nodes.name: Blade Intent Recovery
nodes.desc: Each 1% Haste increases the REG SPD of Blade Intent by 1%.

nodes.name: Divine Sickle
nodes.desc: Each 7 uses of Storm Scythe triggers Divine Sickle. Divine Sickle always deals Crit DMG.

nodes.name: Thunder Sigil Charm
nodes.desc: Increases Max Thunder Sigil by 1. Storm Scythe and Divine Sickle are bound to trigger Piercing Slash.

nodes.name: Duel Awareness
nodes.desc: Deals 20% more DMG to enemies with 80% HP or above.

nodes.name: Shadow Despise
nodes.desc: For each enemy within 3m, you gain 3% Armor Penetration, up to 15%. This effect is doubled against Elite or stronger enemies.

nodes.name: Thunder Strike Enhancement
nodes.desc: Increases the DMG dealt by Thunderstrike by 20%. Each 1% Luck grants Thunderstrike 1% more DMG dealt.

nodes.name: Charge Catcher
nodes.desc: Each enemy defeated grants 1 Charge Seed (effective within a team).

nodes.name: Breath of Mark
nodes.desc: Lucky Hits of Moonstrike grant a fixed 30% chance to restore 1 Thunder Sigil, once per second.

nodes.name: Lightning Flash
nodes.desc: During Stormflash, accelerates Moonstrike's Attack SPD by 100%.

nodes.name: Power of Thunder
nodes.desc:
Every 10 instances of DMG dealt triggers Thunder Power.
Thunder Power: Increases Thunder Element damage dealt by 10 for 10s, stacking up to 10 times.

nodes.name: Phantom Scythe Realm II
nodes.desc: Casting Thundercut has a chance to grant 25 Blade Intent. The chance is equal to your Luck chance.
